2164.subject: MIT
2164.descrlong: Provides overview of project management with a focus on information technology-related projects. Covers basic project elements such as scope, time, cost, quality, human resources, communications, risk, and procurement. Management skills required to lead a team to successful completion of projects, as well as budget and control aspects of projects, are also discussed. Hands-on practice with industry-level project management software and in-depth case studies are integrated into the course.
